title: How should I improve my analytical writing skills for the GRE and the essays that are required by the top universities? - Quora

response.answer_text: Practice! Your analytical skill will improve by practising. Practice as much as you can. If you go over to the offical gre website, you will find a list of all topics related to analytical topics. Now, study a bit on those topics and start writing an essay daily. You should try learning new words daily to improve your vocabulary skill. now, in your free time, you can google some sample essay written on that topic and compare your essay. gre provides examples of essays which have scored 5 or 6. Go over through those essays. Analyse the writing style. You will get better idea on how to write a good essay. Remember, practice your writing skill. It will improve over a period of time.
